result.reason: The current SQL provider lacks proper concurrency control (optimistic concurrency), causing data overwrites when multiple users access the same database.
result.approach: Enable optimistic concurrency by adding a RowVersion column to the database schema and handling DBConcurrencyException in SqlDataProvider to merge or prompt on conflict.
